data.title: Bring Back My Love Spell
data.subtitle: To bring back an ex-lover or end an argument between friends.
data.material:
1. 2 white candles 
 2. A photo of your lover or friend
 3. A photo of yourself smiling
 4.A chamomile teabag
 5.A piece of blue material
data.Procedure:
Perform this spell at 8 o'clock in the evening. At exactly 8 o'clock light the candles and take a few deep relaxing breaths. Visualize a peaceful scene. Now hold in your hand the picture of your ex lover or friend and repeat this chant: 
 ''With the light of the flame
I'll light your desire,
When I speak your name
You'll feel the glow from my fire.
With this spell you will come back to me
So I will it, so mote it be''

Say his or her name slowly 3 times and then put your picture face down on top of his or her picture so that the 2 images are together. Wrap up the pictures, along with the chamomile tea bag in the blue cloth. Put the package in a safe place. To make sure your ex lover or friend gets the message, light the candles and repeat his or her name 3 times each evening at 8 o'clock

data.title: Break up Candle Spell
data.subtitle: Simple break up spell, best done on the full to new moon.

data.title: Make Him Love Me
data.subtitle: This is a potent attraction spell.

data.title: To Attract True Love
data.subtitle: This spell will bring love to you!

data.title: Think About Me
data.subtitle: This is a spell to attract the one you desire.

data.title: Innocent Attraction
data.subtitle: This spell will make the person you cast it upon like you as much as you like him.

data.title: Increase your Attractiveness
data.subtitle: Good spell to use before a date, it helps you to enhance your physical beauty

data.title: Make Him Love You
data.subtitle: A spell to make that someone like you.

data.title: The Wedding Ring Spell
data.subtitle: When you are attracted to someone but the attraction does not seem to be mutual.

data.title: Lost love spell
data.subtitle: You can use this spell to try and reunite with your lost love.

data.title: A Love Brew
data.subtitle: This is a herbal perfume designed to draw love to you.
data.material:
1. A Cauldron
 2. Hibiscus Flower
 3. Raspberry
 4. Poppy seeds
 5. Chicory root
 6. Basil
 7. Coriander seed
 8. White oak bark
 9. Peppermint
 10. Cloves
 11. Rosemary
data.Procedure:
Fill cauldron with water and bring to a boil. Add a pinch of each herb. Let the mixture sit 25 minutes.

The mixture should smell very good at this point and be a dark brown almost black colour. Pull off stove and put into a heat safe container and let cool. Wear as a perfume until you achieve a desired result.

data.title: Start a Flame in the Heart
data.subtitle: A love spell.
data.material:
1. Parchment paper
 2. 1 red candle
 3. Love oil
 4. A drawing of a heart dripping blood
data.Procedure:
On one of the nights of Venus, take a piece of parchment and draw a heart dripping blood onto it.  On the reverse side of the paper, write your name and the name of your lover. You can then anoint a red candle with love oil and place it directly onto the heart that you've drawn on the parchment paper. As you light the candle, chant the following three times:


Burn, flame, and light this love

Bright and shiny as stars above.

Cause love's heart to beat for me,

Light our passion for all to see.


Let the candle burn to ten minutes before you extinguish it. Repeat the spell daily until the candle is consumed.
